title: Besting Hell
description: A brief converZation about Hell, where Shari, Jeff, Michael, Andreas and Luke try to 'steel-man' the position of Eternal Conscious Torment.  This is an attempt to present the least appealing understanding of Hell, in the BEST possible light.  How do you think they did?
